result.arabic_text: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ
result.translation: Mu nyuma, haje Firawuni n’ubugaba bwiwe, haza n’abahakanyi bo hambere yiwe, hamwe n’abantu bo mu bisagara vyimonogoje mu bugaba, barungikiwe Intumwa Luutwi (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah);
